Job Title: Specialist Material Flow Planning (F/M/D)

Location: Knox County, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Ref:19220

LEONI is a global provider of products, solutions and services for energy and data management in the automotive industry. The group of companies has around 95,000 employees in 27 countries and generated consolidated sales of EUR 5.1 billion in 2022

And we are looking for you

TN-23-Mateur South

Your Tasks

 Supports the implementation of the standard IMF processes in the RM warehouse, pagoda and FG warehouse  Supports the development and implementation of continuous improvement actions on the IMF processes, procedures, policies, activities and reports  Supports the definition and maintenance of the IMF KPIs  Calculates the optimized Kanban quantities by considering: production/customer demand, supplier box quantity, replenishment time, delivery routes, ABC XYZ parameters, etc.  Defines the appropriate type of Kanban boxes to be used for each material by considering: defined Kanban quantity, material weight, material volume, other specific storage requirements, etc.  Calculates and ensures the optimum number of storage locations in the RM warehouse, pagoda, production lines and FG warehouse  Defines and optimizes the layout and the space requirements for the storage racks in warehouses (RM & FG) and Pagoda: appropriate storage locations based on ergonomically reasons; proper storage conditions based on the supplier requirements; etc.  Supports allocation and optimization of partnumbers to Supermarket locations based on PFEP.  Calculates the needed resources for running a lean material flow (incl. workload, no. of personnel, equipment, etc.)  Calculates the Capex (transport and storage equipment), Headcount and Space needed for the RM warehouse, Pagoda and FG warehouse 

CAO eKanban

 Prepares and maintains the MINMAX level calculation for cutwires and preassembly products  Close monitoring of open orders for cut wires in order to ensure the availability of material and avoid overproduction  Supports technical changes by planning the run in/run out of circuits and sub-assemblies  Supports the bundle size definition  Responsible for pagoda reports (coverage, obsoletes, requirements VS consumption, etc.) 

Your Skills

 Level of education: University degree  Experience: 3 years in the Automative Industry  IT : MS Office  Social Competencies : Communication / Social & intercultural sensitivity / Change management /Target & result orientation / Motivation & resilience /Self-organization / Confli ct management /Teamwork  Professional Competencies: Supply Chain, Warehouse Management, Production Planning, Procurement 

Our Offer

 Great team energy in an international environment  Work in accordance with the highest standards in the automotive industry  Opportunity for professional development and career promotions  Continuous learning and improvement 

 Next steps? 

Apply online. We are looking forward to meeting you.

 LEONI "Mateur South" 

Human Resources Management, +216 31 326 354

 People of all genders are always meant equally; For linguistic simplification and better readability, only the masculine form is used in the text.

LEONI processes your application data in an IT-system that is consistent across the company and uses Foreign Service providers. By sending your application, you agree to this procedure. LEONI ensures the compliance with data protection.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
